attributes.action: Ban Tobacco Burning Cigarettes and Replace With E-Cigarettes
attributes.additional_details:
We all know the devastating effect on health of smoking and the massive anti social nature of smoking (forcing others to inhale passive smoke and all the associated carcinogens and toxins. The associated litter from discarded ends and packets).
Now that e-cigarettes offer an alternative to burning tobacco without the associated anti social elements, grasp this opportunity and ban the burning of tobacco.
